resources.string: Current SU is not supported.\nThe app only works with CM-SU\nDevice current SU version is:
SELinux set to Enforcing!\nThis is need by safety Net app\'s
Change SELinux when SU is activated
If ON will set SELinux to Enforcing\nIf OFF will set SELinux to Permissive
No iSu Kernel Support!!!\nPlease flash the kernel support .zip or you may loose SU access

If you use iSu to deactivate SU and lost SU support try…\nA reboot if you have iSu kernel support, if you don\'t have kernel support reflash yours current ROM .zip, without SU access the app can\'t tell if you have reboot support so also check in Setting Developer option if Root accesses is granted to apps, in doubt check XDA thread link in About iSu… XDA support forun site.
Click here to go to iSu download folder
Activate SELinux when SU is deactivated
If ON will set SELinux to Enforcing when deactivate SU, this is need by safety net apps
From android Developer options\nEnable the Android Debug Bridge (adb) interface
This featuring is only need for some devices\nIf ON will activate/deactivate Android debugging
Show a notification when SU is deactivated
Show Toast notifications when changing SU
hey ho let\'s go play Pokemon!!!
How many miles we are going today?
Don\'t you have homework to do? Ooo I see you are a grownup, grownup I see -_-
Have you??? tie your phone to the ceiling fan to try and get yours Pokemon eggs to hatch faster
Presidents and Prime Ministers are playing Pokemon Go around the world, I guess you can say you\'re just practicing to be a politician -_-

Alakazam: Alakazam, Alakazam, Alakazam!
Ash: Pokedex, what Pokemon is that?!
Pokedex: -_- That is an Alakazam!
Ash: No way!
Chuck Norris won the World Series of Poker using Pokemon cards.
Chuck Noris caught all 150 Pokemon in 2.7 seconds.
How long will it be? before people start naming their kids after Pokemon
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/isu
A simple app to deactivate SU at will and pass safety verification for some apps, today it works only on SU binary of CM/LOS base ROM\'s.
There is no email client installed on the device.
There is no web browser installed on the device.
Select the apps that will deactivate SU:
Select the apps that will activate SU:
A Service to monitor when foreground app starts and activate or deactivate SU.
Select the apps that will make iSu activate SU when started.
Select the apps that will make iSu deactivate SU when started.\n(deactivating SU will also set SELinux to enforcing)
Deactivate SU to any app if SU is activated
Activated SU to any app if SU is deactivated
If on, will automatic active SU when leave the app that deactivated SU
A tool to change props that may be use to block the access to some apps
Some apps may block the access base on the state of the below prop flags
*This prop need a reboot after change, for Root Beer check.
Click on a individual Prop to change it
